mapper.sql: id, type, subtype, hostname, hostid, hostphone, number, lessee, stay, employee, expend, addtime, updatetime, policeid, policename, policearea
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_people (type, subtype, hostname, hostid, hostphone, number, lessee,stay, employee, expend, addtime, updatetime, policeid, policename, policearea ) values (#{type}, #{subtype}, #{hostname}, #{hostid}, #{hostphone}, #{number}, #{lessee}, #{stay}, #{employee}, #{expend}, #{addtime}, #{updatetime}, #{policeid}, #{policename}, #{policearea} )
mapper.update: update t_people set type = #{type}, subtype = #{subtype}, hostname = #{hostname}, hostid = #{hostid}, hostphone = #{hostphone}, number = #{number}, lessee = #{lessee}, stay = #{stay}, employee = #{employee}, expend = #{expend}, updatetime = #{updatetime} where id = #{id}
